build-type.name: Publish
build-type.description: Download latest successful MPS build from JetBrains TeamCity and upload to artifacts.itemis.cloud

parameters.param:
println("Running mvn --version") ProcessBuilder("mvn", "--version").redirectErrorStream(true).redirectOutput(ProcessBuilder.Redirect.INHERIT).start().waitFor()
println("Running unzip --help") ProcessBuilder("unzip", "--help").redirectErrorStream(true).redirectOutput(ProcessBuilder.Redirect.INHERIT).start().waitFor()
